pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Foot Repair
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Dual layered booties contain an intensive moisturising serum packed with Plant Extracts for soft, silky smooth feet. The outer layer of the booties stays dry so you can continue with daily activities.

  • Helps soothe rough, dry feet and heels
  • Intensely moisturising
  • Skin nutrition

Shea Butter, Ginkgo Biloba, Green Tea, Peppermint and Seaweed intensely moisturise. Helping to soothe and soften rough, dry feet and heels.

Directions

Cleanse feet, tear open sachet and remove booties, place feet inside (taking care to make sure your foot is inside the inner layer), wear for 15-20 minutes, remove masks, do not rinse.
